Question 1.answer_a: Class Diagram must contain name, attribute, and operation methods of the class
Question 1.answer_b: Class Diagram represents the structure of the system
Question 1.answer_c: There is generally no relationship between different classes
Question 1.answer_d: Class diagram must be the first step when doing Requirement Elicitation
